name: Soul Sipper
description:
To play the game online, click here!

Suck the souls of unsuspecting victims to survive in Soul Sipper, a twisted platformer game by Mors, Gaem, and Catonator. Use your straw to propel yourself through 9 levels filled with many different obstacles!

Controls:

Z: Jump

X: Succ

Find us at:

Mors: https://mors-games.com/

Gaem: https://twitter.com/_gaem_0n/

Catonator: https://catonator.net/
